Package magellan.client.swing.tree

Class SkillNodeWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • magellan.client.swing.tree.DefaultNodeWrapper
      • magellan.client.swing.tree.SkillNodeWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CellObject, CellObject2, SupportsClipboard, SupportsEmphasizing
    public class SkillNodeWrapper
extends DefaultNodeWrapper
implements CellObject2, SupportsClipboard
    A node that wraps a skill

    • Constructor Detail

      • SkillNodeWrapper

        public SkillNodeWrapper​(Unit u,
                        Skill s,
                        Skill ms)
        Creates a new SkillNodeWrapper object.
        Parameters:
        u - the unit with the specified skills.
        s - the base skill. If s is null, it is assumed that the unit acquires that skill only through a person transfer. s and ms may not both be null.
        ms - the modified skill. If ms is null, it is assumed that the modification of the skill cannot be determined. s and ms may not both be null.

      • getIconNames

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getIconNames()
        Description copied from interface: CellObject
        Returns a list of String objects that denote the file name (without the extension) of the icons to be displayed by the tree cell renderer. A return value of null is valid to indicate that no icons shall be displayed.
        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • init

        public NodeWrapperDrawPolicy init​(java.util.Properties p1,
                                  java.lang.String p2,

        Description copied from interface: CellObject
        Creates a preferences adapter factory.
        Specified by:
        init in interface CellObject
        p2 - Prefix for properties keys
        p3 - The cell object should be appended to this adapter. If this is null a new adapter should be returned.
        Returns:
        A preferences adapter factory. If adapter!=null it should be returned. If this object has no changeable preferences, null should be returned.
